channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

item.title: Report E-2024050228
item.description:
Report E-2024050228

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-13T15:12:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-23
  • City: MENOMONEE FALLS
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While unloading a IBC from a trailer a Veolia's ten day intransit facility in Menomonee Falls, WI, a Veolia employee noticed a viscous liquid was released through a hole towards the top of the tote. The amount of release was less than 1/2 gallon and was contained to the side of the tote and the tote cage. The result of the investigation into the incident was inconclusive but it is suspected that it was punctured by the fork of the forklift during loading at the shipper's site.

item.title: Report X-2024050089
item.description:
Report X-2024050089

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-26
  • City: OAK CREEK
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO DOOR 26 IN THE UNLOAD TO PICK UP A LEAKER. RESPONDER PLACED THE LEAKING PACKAGE IN A LINED SPILL TRAY AND BROUGHT BACK TO THE SERVICE CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
